configuration.title: SAP Fiori Tools - Guided Development
configuration.properties.enableTelemetry: Enable telemetry data to be captured for SAP Fiori Tools - Guided Development extension. (if enabled the setting still abides by the overall 'Telemetry: enable telemetry' setting). As part of the telemetry data recording, non personally identifiable information is used to help understand product usage and improve the product.
configuration.properties.deprecation.ena: This setting has been deprecated. Refer to https://help.sap.com/viewer/17d50220bcd848aa854c9c182d65b699/Latest/en-US/837c23115bff43b4a245e9f01b0e80f7.html
commands.help.openGuidedDevelopmentToThe: Open Guided Development to the Side
sap.ux.help.showDescriptions: Set the visibility of descriptions in Guided Development guides
sap.ux.help.showDescriptions.enum.enable: Show all guide, step, and parameter descriptions
sap.ux.help.loggingLevel.enum.info.desc: Provides general information about the application
sap.ux.help.loggingLevel.enum.warn.desc: Provides warnings and information that may require developer attention
sap.ux.help.loggingLevel.enum.error.desc: Provides information related to a failure in the application
sap.ux.help.loggingLevel.enum.debug.desc: Provides information to help diagnose and troubleshoot issues in the application
